response.job_title: Senior Solutions Architect en Red Hat
response.summary: Solutions architect with experience in design and governance of APIs and cloud projects using microservices in Openshift and AKS. Experience in full stack development using SCRUM methodology and applying UI/UX principles in delivered applications. Innovative person and always looking to learn about new technologies. High teamwork and commitment, leadership and problem solving skills with assertive communication.
response.skills: Red Hat subscription product portfolio, Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL), Red Hat OpenShift, Red Hat Ansible Automation Platform, Scaled Agile Framework (SAFe), Innovación tecnológica, Gestión de la innovación, Gestión de proyectos, Python, Django, Desarrollo de innovación, Red de telefonía móvil, Linux, Trabajo colaborativo, .NET Framework, .NET Core, Angular, SQL, Infraestructura, Scrum

profile_positions.description:
- Define architectural references and guidelines for local and Hispanamerica initiatives.
- Design of solutions architectures according to business requirements.
- Elaboration of development templates using Spring Boot.
- Communication with stakeholders, technical leads and development teams.
- Lead technically the elaboration of POCs for the adoption of new technologies.
profile_positions.title: HISPAM Solutions Architect

profile_positions.description:
- Full stack development of non-standard or innovative projects.
- Lead POCs with third parties and perform own POCs to incorporate new technologies into the business.
- Elaborate UX oriented design solutions.
profile_positions.title: Digital Exploration Professional

profile_positions.description:
- Full stack development of web applications able to support high concurrency and with high disponibility.
- Manage of on-premise infraestructure.
- Design and implementation of relational databases.
profile_positions.title: Professional of Support and Technological Evolution

profile_positions.description:
- Automate support process using Django.
- Elaborate dashboards of servers and teleco services health.
- Collaboration in one of the first virtualization of teleco core network around the world.
profile_positions.title: Young Professional in Circuit Core (CICO)

education.degree_name: Fundamentals of Business Process Management BPM

company.name: Red Hat
company.description:
Red Hat is the world’s leading provider of enterprise open source solutions, using a community-powered approach to deliver high-performing Linux, hybrid cloud, edge, and Kubernetes technologies.

We hire creative, passionate people who are ready to contribute their ideas, help solve complex problems, and make an impact. Opportunities are open. Join us.
